traits.label: size
traits.name: :size
traits.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

traits.label: tag
traits.name: :tag
traits.desc: HTML tag to render, unless no icon is supplied or it's an svg icon

traits.label: name
traits.name: :name
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

traits.label: color
traits.name: :color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: left
traits.name: :left
traits.desc: Useful if icon is on the left side of something: applies a standard margin on the right side of Icon

traits.label: right
traits.name: :right
traits.desc: Useful if icon is on the right side of something: applies a standard margin on the left side of Icon
